name: file2sharepoint
description: Uploads files to SharePoint from local storage.

arguments.name: source
arguments.description: Path to the local file or directory to upload.

OFFICE365_USERNAME.description: Office365 username for user authentication (used if present).

OFFICE365_PASSWORD.description: Office365 password for user authentication (used if present).

OFFICE365_CLIENTID.description: OAuth client ID for app authentication (used if username/password are not set).

OFFICE365_CLSECRET.description: OAuth client secret for app authentication (used if username/password are not set).

OFFICE365_TENANT.description: The tenant (subdomain) of the Office365/SharePoint site.

OFFICE365_SITE.description: The site name within the tenant.

SHAREPOINT_LIBRARY.description: The SharePoint library or folder path for file uploads.

author: VitexSoftware
